post.author: vertex007
post.body:
What game content is included in DOOM 3 BFG Edition?

BFG Edition includes DOOM, DOOM 2, DOOM 3, Resurrection of Evil, and The Lost Mission are all accessible from the main menu/launcher.
DOOM 3 BFG Edition does not contain the DOOM Master Levels or Final DOOM

How can I purchase DOOM 3 BFG Edition?

Fans will be able to buy the Xbox 360, and PlayStation 3 and PC release at retail stores. We will be releasing a digital download PC version through Steam and other digital retailers.

What multiplayer is included for DOOM 3 BFG Edition?

ONLINE multiplayer for Xbox 360 and PS3:

DOOM: 2-4 players per map

DOOM II: 2-4 players per map

DOOM 3 and Resurrection of Evil: 2-4 players per map

Lost Mission: N/A
OFFLINE multiplayer for Xbox 360 and PS3:

DOOM: 2-4 players per map

DOOM II: 2-4 players per map

DOOM 3 and Resurrection of Evil: N/A

Lost Mission: N/A

PC Multiplayer

On PC online Multiplayer for DOOM 3 and Resurrection of Evil is 2-8 players.

On PC there is no multiplayer options for Doom and Doom II.

Is there any co-op gameplay included with DOOM 3 BFG Edition?

The co-op gameplay for DOOM 3 was only included with the original Xbox release of DOOM 3. As BFG Edition is based upon the original PC release, there is no online/offline cooperative play. The Xbox 360 and PS3 versions of DOOM and DOOM II feature online and splitscreen co-op supporting 2-4 players.

Which versions of DOOM 3 BFG Edition support the Oculus Rift VR headset?

The upcoming Oculus Rift headset will be compatible with the PC release of DOOM 3 BFG Edition. Unfortunately, we’re not able to support this functionality on consoles.

Which versions of DOOM 3 BFG Edition support 3D?

DOOM 3, Resurrection of Evil, and The Lost Mission support 3D, including consoles connected to compatible 3D televisions. The versions of DOOM and DOOM II that are included do not support 3D.
